title: Small Frog
description:
Small blue glazed faience frog seated on a square base on the front of which is a cartouche of Amenhotep III. 
Condition: Head entirely missing as are the two front legs. Back legs badly chipped, back of base chipped. The object is of excellent workmanship and fine color. There is a small cavity on the under side of the base it seems probable that the object served as a cover to a small receptable.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
